title: Combating Phishing Emails with NLP and State-of-the-art Machine Learning
abstract: Phishing attacks via emails trick users into revealing sensitive information, causing significant data breaches. This paper proposes a machine learning-based detection approach using NLP and BERT for accurate identification.

title: Activity Analysis of Public Financial Mobile Applications
abstract: Public financial apps handle sensitive user data, requiring strict monitoring for security. This work focuses on building a robust dataset and implementing anomaly detection pipelines for enhanced protection.

title: Machine Learning-Powered Threat Detection Framework for attacks in IoT Devices
abstract: IoT device networks face evolving security threats, requiring advanced detection mechanisms. This work focuses on developing a machine learning-powered framework for effective threat detection.
